alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 9:29PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Worcester and northwestern Middlesex Counties through 1015 PM EDT... At 928 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Westminster, or near Fitchburg, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leominster, Fitchburg, Gardner, Holden, Clinton, Groton, Lunenburg, Townsend, Littleton, Lancaster, Templeton, Sterling, West Boylston, Ayer, Westminster, Shirley, Harvard, Ashburnham, Boxborough and Bolton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County
